testsuite.name: tests.departments.opd.AddPatientsTest
testsuite.system-out: Test Case Description: Validate Login successful Expected: true Actual: true Test Case Description: Selected the Facility - TESTING_FACILITY - TST Expected: true Actual: true Test Case Description: Logged In User = PR.Akash test Expected: true Actual: true Test Case Description: The Facility - TST is already selected. Expected: true Actual: true Test Case Description: Selected Option Organisation Settings Expected: true Actual: true Test Case Description: Selected Option in the Left Panel = General Expected: true Actual: true Test Case Description: Selected Sub Option in the Left Panel = Patient Settings Expected: true Actual: true Test Case Description: Selected mandatory field in Patient setting are First Name, Mobile Number Expected: true Actual: true Test Case Description: OPD department is selected. Expected: true Actual: true Test Case Description: Add Appointment Button is clicked Expected: true Actual: true Test Case Description: Add New Patient Button is displayed Expected: true Actual: true Test Case Description: Add New Patient Button is clicked Expected: true Actual: true Test Case Description: No. of Tabs on Patient Reg. & Appointment Form is 4 Expected: true Actual: true Test Case Description: Patient Details Tab is selected on start by default. Expected: true Actual: true Test Case Description: Patient Details Tab is displayed on the form. Expected: true Actual: true Test Case Description: Other Details Tab is displayed on the form. Expected: true Actual: true Test Case Description: History Tab is displayed on the form. Expected: true Actual: true Test Case Description: Allergies Tab is displayed on the form. Expected: true Actual: true Test Case Description: Alert for compulsory field is visible by default on the empty form. Expected: true Actual: true Test Case Description: Validate that the Compulsory sections message is First Name and Mobile Number are Compulsory. Expected: true Actual: true Test Case Description: Alert for compulsory field is highlighted in Red when trying to Create Appointment with empty form. Message = First Name and Mobile Number are Compulsory. Expected: true Actual: true Test Case Description: First Name is visible in the Compulsory Fields alert message. Expected: true Actual: true Test Case Description: Mobile Number is visible in the Compulsory Fields alert message. Expected: true Actual: true Test Case Description: Salutation for Patient is selected as - Mr. Expected: true Actual: true Test Case Description: First Name is entered as - Elon Expected: true Actual: true Test Case Description: Middle Name is entered as - Expected: true Actual: true Test Case Description: Last Name is entered as - Expected: true Actual: true Test Case Description: Mobile Number is entered as - 1234567890 Expected: true Actual: true Test Case Description: MRNfytdg entered for Medical Report Number Expected: true Actual: true
